front.title: Definitions of Managed Objects for Routing Bridges (RBridges)
front.abstract: This memo defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols. In particular, it defines objects for managing a Routing Bridge (RBridge), also known as a TRILL Switch, based on the IETF TRILL (Transparent Interconnection of Lots of Links) protocol. [STANDARDS-TRACK]
